Package ure.areas

Class UArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • ure.areas.UArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, UTimeListener
    public class UArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements UTimeListener, java.io.Serializable
    UArea implements a self-contained 2D map of roguelike playfield cells.
    See Also:
